topComments.author: Nancy Meadows
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A caminhada na selva at√© a caverna Jaguar Paw poderia ter sido mais agrad√°vel sem ter que carregar a boia interna ou usar sapatos de √°gua, capacete e colete salva-vidas. O flutuador de caverna foi muito agrad√°vel - a √°gua clara foi certamente "chocantemente refrescante"! O guia de caminhada na selva / caverna, Harold, foi muito √∫til e amig√°vel. O almo√ßo inclu√≠do era simples, mas estava muito bom. Nosso guia Shanna Banana era muito experiente e amig√°vel enquanto falava e tamb√©m respondia a perguntas no √¥nibus de e para a √°rea de Jaguar Cave. No geral, uma boa experi√™ncia!  (Original) The jungle trek to Jaguar Paw cave could have been more enjoyable without having to carry the inner tube float or wear water shoes, helmet and life jacket. Maybe issuing those items at the mouth of the cave, after the trek would be better? The $10 fee to rent a locker to store shoes and valuables prior to the trek was a suprise- I don't remember reading about it in the excursion description. The cave float was very enjoyable- the clear water was certainly "shockingly refreshing"! The jungle trek/cave guide, Harold, was very helpful and friendly. The included lunch was simple, but was very good. Our guide Shanna Banana was very knowledgeable and friendly as she talked and also answered questions on the bus to and from the Jaguar Cave area. Overall a good experience!

topComments.author: Charlotte Tripp
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nossos guias foram excelentes. Kirk estava conosco no passeio de √¥nibus do porto e era inacreditavelmente informativo sobre Belize. A longa viagem de √¥nibus ficou mais agrad√°vel com todas as informa√ß√µes que recebemos e as perguntas que ele respondeu.  Quando chegamos ao local de turismo, primeiro temos arm√°rios se precis√°vamos deles, ent√£o, pronto para praticar. Que hora maravilhosa! N√≥s tivemos sorte o suficiente para ver um par de macacos bugios dormindo nas √°rvores. A √∫nica "queixa" na tirolesa √© o tempo era muito curto, lol.  Ap√≥s o tirolesa, tivemos o almo√ßo fornecido, que era muito saborosa. Eu n√£o sou um comedor muito aventureiro, no entanto, eu estava muito satisfeito com a comida fornecida.   Ent√£o veio a tubula√ß√£o da caverna. Sempre foi nosso guia e ele foi √≥timo. Muito informativo e capaz de responder a todas as nossas perguntas. N√≥s vimos v√°rios morcegos pequenos nas cavernas (entretanto eles estavam alli para cima no teto e se voc√™ est√° preocupado sobre eles que voam a voc√™, voc√™ n√£o deveria ser). N√≥s at√© tivemos a oportunidade de nadar atrav√©s da parte da caverna que foi fant√°stico! Como um tour √∫nico, n√≥s realmente apreciamos o nosso dia.  Ok o caminho de volta ao porto, Kirk forneceu um pouco mais informa√ß√µes sobre Belize, respondeu √†s perguntas, e deu uso algum "tempo de sil√™ncio" para relaxar antes de chegarmos de volta ao nosso concurso.  Este foi realmente um dia fant√°stico, e a equipe foi incr√≠vel! (E em nosso passeio tenro atr√°s para o navio, n√≥s √©ramos bastante afortunados para ver um p√¥r-do-sol deslumbrante).  (Original) Our guides were excellent.  Kirk was with us on the bus ride from the port and was incredibly informative about Belize.  The long bus ride was made more pleasant with all the information we received and the questions he answered.  When we arrived at the tour site, we first got lockers if we needed them, then got ready for ziplining.  What an awesome time!  We were lucky enough to see a couple of howler monkeys sleeping in the trees.  The only "complaint" on the ziplining is the time was too short, lol.  After the zipline we had the provided lunch, which was quite tasty.  I'm not a very adventurous eater, however I was plenty satisfied with the food provided.  Then came the cave tubing.  Ever was our guide and he was great.  Very informative, and able to answer all our questions.  We saw several small bats in the caves (though they were alli up on the ceiling and if you're concerned about them flying at you, you shouldn't be).  We even had the opportunity to swim through part of the cave which was fantastic!  Such a unique tour, we really enjoyed our day.  Ok the way back to port, Kirk provided a bit more information about Belize, answered questions, and gave use some "quiet time" to relax before we arrived back at our tender.  This was truly a fantastic day, and the staff was incredible! (And on our tender ride back to the ship, we were fortunate enough to see a gorgeous sunset).

Cave tubing foi uma experi√™ncia √∫nica, n√£o √© realmente nada de aventura, como sobre isso, mas foi legal para ver e guias eram bons.  (Original) Lots of touristy adventure things to do here. topComments.author: John Myers
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta excurs√£o em Belize foi absolutamente incr√≠vel.  Nosso guia foi extremamente bem informados sobre o local Flora e fauna e nossa caminhada do trailhead at√© a caverna foi mais ricas para ele. Eu quero escrever uma revis√£o detalhada deste site e turn√™, mas seria preenchido com termos subjetivos como incr√≠vel, bonito, deslumbrante, fenomenal, etc ... que seria dif√≠cil de avaliar do ponto de vista de um leitor.  Basta dizer que eu recomendo vivamente este passeio. Minha esposa foi incapaz de assistir ao nosso dia de excurs√£o de Belize, mas eu pretendo voltar com ela. Para mim vale a pena.  Se voc√™ quiser economizar algum dinheiro, traga seus pr√≥prios sapatos de √°gua e, se levar um saco, certifique-se de que ele seja √† prova d'√°gua. Caso contr√°rio, voc√™ acabar√° alugando um arm√°rio e sapatos que custar√£o US $ 15 a US $ adicionais.  (Original) This excursion in Belize was absolutely amazing.  Our guide was extremely knowledgeable about the local Flora and fauna and our walk from the trailhead to the cave was richer for it.  I want to write a detailed review of this site and tour, but it would be filled with subjective terms like amazing, beautiful, breathtaking, superb, phenominal, etc... that would be difficult to assess from a reader's standpoint.  Suffice it to say, I would HIGHLY recommend this tour.  My wife was unable to attend our Belize excursion day but I intend to go back with her.  To me it is worth it.  If you want to save some money, bring your own water shoes and if you bring a bag, make sure it is waterproof.  Otherwise you will end up renting a locker and shoes which will cost you an additional $15-20 USD.

De cheque em n√≥s caminhamos atr√°s aproximadamente uma milha √† caverna, Nosso pequeno grupo foi enganchado junto e nosso guia de excurs√£o nos levou lan√ßou as cavernas e contou nos fatos sobre as cavernas, Sim pessoal eles eram morcegos voando acima da nossa cabe√ßa. Se voc√™ j√° conseguiu ir para Belize, este √© um deve fazer A √°gua estava um pouco fria, mas depois de alguns minutos foi muito relaxante  (Original) We did cave tubing in Belize  Our first time ever doing anything like this .By far the coolest .From check in we hiked back about a mile to the cave , Our little group was hooked together and our tour guide led us threw the caves and told us facts about the caves,  Yes folks they was bats flying above our head .If you ever get to go to Belize,This is a must do The water was a little cold , but after a few mins it was very relaxing
